185927263.review:
I recently played Forts, and I honestly don't understand the hype around this game. The concept seems promising at first—building and defending forts while launching weapons at your opponent's base—but the execution is seriously lacking. The controls feel clunky, and the building mechanics are unintuitive and frustrating. It often feels like the game punishes you for experimenting with different strategies, and the learning curve is unnecessarily steep.

The matchmaking is terrible too. I kept getting paired with players who were way more experienced, which made the game feel like a grind rather than fun. The visuals are nothing special, and the sound design could really use some improvement. Overall, I found the game repetitive and uninspired. I don't think I’ll be coming back to this one.

184514141.review: Игра отличная, спасибо разработчикам! Если попадёте в хорошую компанию, то наиграете в игру тысячи часов. Вариаций боёв куча, и каждый приходится оттачивать(Если говорить про ранкед, то в большинстве случаев игры становятся шаблонными). Внешние факторы не так сильно влияют на твою игру, как например последовательность действий(Это же стратегия). Минусов у игры не так много, к примеру баги в основном замечают профессиональные игроки. Итог: покупайте, не пожалеете:)

184142573.review:
Base building, resource getting, blowing things up - like many fun casual games rolled up into a fun more serious game.

No achievement for shooting down a mortar shell with a sniper rifle though :(   or shooting down your own mortar shell :(   or having perfect aim as nüb with a sniper rifle :(  but in my mind these accomplishments will forever comfort me thank you Forts :)

Also the music is fantastic, esp. the themed menu music. Here, Xmas brings people together [i]and[/i] blows people apart! Hooray!
